00048 TargetWriter::TargetWriter(  TargetCalculator* tc,
00049                              WeightCalculator* wc,
00050                              std::string target_base_name,
00051                              std::string weight_base_name )
00052   : targetCalc(tc), 
00053     weightCalc(wc), 
00054     targetName(target_base_name), 
00055     weightName(weight_base_name)
00056     {}
00057 
00058 TargetWriter::~TargetWriter() {}
00059 
00060 std::string TargetWriter::get_name() const
00061   { return "TargetWriter"; }
00062 
00063 double TargetWriter::loop_over_mesh( Mesh* mesh, 
00064                                      MeshDomain* domain, 
00065                                      const Settings* settings,
00066                                      MsqError& err )
00067 {
00068   PatchData patch;
00069   patch.set_mesh( mesh );
00070   patch.set_domain( domain );
00071   if (settings)
00072     patch.attach_settings( settings );
00073   
00074   ElementPatches patch_set;
00075   patch_set.set_mesh( mesh );
00076   std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle> patches;
00077   std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle>::iterator p;
00078   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_verts;
00079   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> patch_elems;
00080   
00081   patch_set.get_patch_handles( patches, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00082   
00083   std::vector< MsqMatrix<3,3> > targets3d;
00084   std::vector< MsqMatrix<3,2> > targets2dorient;
00085   std::vector< MsqMatrix<2,2> > targets2d;
00086   std::vector< double > weights;
00087   std::vector< Sample > samples;
00088   for (p = patches.begin(); p != patches.end(); ++p)
00089   {
00090     patch_verts.clear();
00091     patch_elems.clear();
00092     patch_set.get_patch( *p, patch_elems, patch_verts, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00093     patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elems, patch_verts, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00094     assert(patch.num_elements() == 1);
00095     
00096     MsqMeshEntity& elem = patch.element_by_index(0);
00097     EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00098     patch.get_samples( 0, samples, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00099     if (samples.empty())
00100       continue;    
00101     
00102     if (targetCalc) {
00103       const unsigned dim = TopologyInfo::dimension(type);
00104       if (dim == 3) {
00105         targets3d.resize( samples.size() );
00106         for (unsigned i = 0; i < samples.size(); ++i) {
00107           targetCalc->get_3D_target( patch, 0, samples[i], targets3d[i], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00108 
00109           if (DBL_EPSILON > det(targets3d[i])) {
00110             MSQ_SETERR(err)("Inverted 3D target", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00111             return 0.0;
00112           }
00113         }
00114         
00115         TagHandle tag = get_target_tag( 3, samples.size(), mesh,  err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00116         mesh->tag_set_element_data( tag, 1, 
00117                                     patch.get_element_handles_array(), 
00118                                     arrptr(targets3d), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00119       }
00120       else if(targetCalc->have_surface_orient()) {
00121         targets2dorient.resize( samples.size() );
00122         for (unsigned i = 0; i < samples.size(); ++i) {
00123           targetCalc->get_surface_target( patch, 0, samples[i], targets2dorient[i], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00124 
00125           MsqMatrix<3,1> cross = targets2dorient[i].column(0) * targets2dorient[i].column(1);
00126           if (DBL_EPSILON > (cross%cross)) {
00127             MSQ_SETERR(err)("Degenerate 2D target", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00128             return 0.0;
00129           }
00130         }
00131         
00132         TagHandle tag = get_target_tag( 2, samples.size(), mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00133         mesh->tag_set_element_data( tag, 1, 
00134                                     patch.get_element_handles_array(), 
00135                                     arrptr(targets2dorient), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00136       }
00137       else {
00138         targets2d.resize( samples.size() );
00139         for (unsigned i = 0; i < samples.size(); ++i) {
00140           targetCalc->get_2D_target( patch, 0, samples[i], targets2d[i], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00141 
00142           if (DBL_EPSILON > det(targets2d[i])) {
00143             MSQ_SETERR(err)("Degenerate/Inverted 2D target", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00144             return 0.0;
00145           }
00146         }
00147         
00148         TagHandle tag = get_target_tag( 2, samples.size(), mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00149         mesh->tag_set_element_data( tag, 1, 
00150                                     patch.get_element_handles_array(), 
00151                                     arrptr(targets2d), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00152       }
00153     }
00154       
00155     if (weightCalc) {
00156       weights.resize( samples.size() );
00157       for (unsigned i = 0; i < samples.size(); ++i) {
00158         weights[i] = weightCalc->get_weight( patch, 0, samples[i], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00159       }
00160       TagHandle tag = get_weight_tag( samples.size(), mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00161       mesh->tag_set_element_data( tag, 1, 
00162                                   patch.get_element_handles_array(),
00163                                   arrptr(weights), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00164     }
00165   }
00166 
00167   return 0.0;
00168 }
00169 
00170 TagHandle TargetWriter::get_target_tag( unsigned dim, unsigned count, Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00171 {
00172   if (dim == 2 && !targetCalc->have_surface_orient())
00173     count *= 4;
00174   else
00175     count *= 3*dim; // num doubles
00176   if (targetTags.size() <= count)
00177     targetTags.resize( count+1, 0 );
00178   if (!targetTags[count]) {
00179     targetTags[count] = get_tag_handle( targetName, count, mesh, err );
00180     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00181       targetTags[count] = 0;
00182       return 0;
00183     }
00184   }
00185   return targetTags[count];
00186 }
00187 
00188 TagHandle TargetWriter::get_weight_tag( unsigned count, Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00189 {
00190   if (weightTags.size() <= count)
00191     weightTags.resize( count+1, 0 );
00192   if (!weightTags[count]) {
00193     weightTags[count] = get_tag_handle( weightName, count, mesh, err );
00194     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00195       weightTags[count] = 0;
00196       return 0;
00197     }
00198   }
00199   return weightTags[count];
00200 }
00201 
00202 TagHandle TargetWriter::get_tag_handle( const std::string& base_name,
00203                                         unsigned num_dbl, Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00204 {
00205   std::ostringstream sstr;
00206   sstr << base_name << num_dbl;
00207   
00208   TagHandle handle = mesh->tag_get( sstr.str().c_str(), err );
00209   if (!MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00210   {
00211     std::string temp_name;
00212     Mesh::TagType temp_type;
00213     unsigned temp_length;
00214     mesh->tag_properties( handle, temp_name, temp_type, temp_length, err );
00215     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00216     
00217     if (temp_type != Mesh::DOUBLE || temp_length != num_dbl)
00218     {
00219       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS,
00220                       "Mismatched type or length for existing tag \"%s\"",
00221                        sstr.str().c_str() );
00222     }
00223   }
00224   else if (err.error_code() == MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND)
00225   {
00226     err.clear();
00227     handle = mesh->tag_create( sstr.str().c_str(), Mesh::DOUBLE, num_dbl, 0, err );
00228     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00229   }
00230   return handle;
00231 }

00234                                      MeshDomain* ,
00235                                      const Settings* ,
00236                                      MsqError&  )

00238 }
